meanings.definition: A tendency or preference towards something.
meanings.sent1: Her inclinings towards art started at a young age.
meanings.sent2: His inclinings towards sweets made him choose the chocolate cake.
meanings.sent3: Despite his inclinings towards adventure, he decided to stay home and read a book.
meanings.sent4: Her inclinings towards kindness were evident in the way she treated others.
meanings.sent5: The cat's inclinings towards napping in the sun were well-known in the neighborhood.

meanings.definition: The act of bending or leaning in a particular direction.
meanings.sent1: The inclinings of the tree branches made a beautiful archway.
meanings.sent2: The inclinings of the tower gave it a unique shape.
meanings.sent3: The inclinings of the building made it look like it was about to topple over.
meanings.sent4: The inclinings of the road led them straight to the beach.
meanings.sent5: The inclinings of the mountain made it a challenging climb.
